rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
甜菜根汁在提高运动表现方面优于硝酸盐补充剂与膳食硝酸盐和硝酸盐相比，甜菜根汁 (BRJ) 因其丰富的植物营养素含量而具有卓越的运动和恢复功效，可增强有氧运动能力并减少疲劳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Beetroot-juice-outperforms-硝酸盐-supplements-in-boosting-exercise-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Beetroot-juice-outperforms-硝酸盐-supplements-in-boosting-exercise-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80087b7b-3359-44da-bc89-65bb536ee801 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 23:04:00 -0500 Beetroot juice outperforms nitrate supplements in boosting exercise performance
十月出生的人与较高的流感疫苗接种率和较低的诊断率有关《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项美国研究发现，与其他月份出生的儿童相比，十月份出生的儿童更有可能接种流感疫苗，也最不可能被诊断出患有流感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/October-births-linked-to-higher-flu-vaccination-and-lower-diagnosis-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/October-births-linked-to-higher-flu-vaccination-and-lower-diagnosis-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6827d7cb-4436-40cf-8c64-98cbc4606858 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 23:01:43 -0500 October births linked to higher flu vaccination and lower diagnosis rates
研究发现，饮食会影响帕金森氏症的运动症状，补充剂没有任何好处荟萃分析表明，地中海饮食和生酮饮食可以改善帕金森病患者的运动功能，尽管膳食补充剂不会提高 UPDRS 或 6MWT 评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Diets-impact-Parkinsons-motor-symptoms-supplements-show-no-benefit-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Diets-impact-Parkinsons-motor-symptoms-supplements-show-no-benefit-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98f1dcd5-f1fb-4649-b83a-32f8eca89ebe Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:50:00 -0500 Diets impact Parkinson's motor symptoms, supplements show no benefit, study finds
研究发现，维生素 D3 和植物化学物质可共同增强免疫力和防御衰老该评论强调了维生素 D3 和植物化学物质在促进免疫平衡、减少炎症、支持肠道健康和抗衰老方面的协同作用，强调了这些营养素对于长寿和活力的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Vitamin-D3-and-phytochemicals-team-up-for-immune-boost-and-aging-defense-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Vitamin-D3-and-phytochemicals-team-up-for-immune-boost-and-aging-defense-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79e9ed8a-9f33-4726-a55d-6ec19d9c6655 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:19:00 -0500 Vitamin D3 and phytochemicals team up for immune boost and aging defense, study finds
细颗粒物暴露与重大疾病住院人数增加有关《英国医学杂志》今天发表的两项大型美国研究发现，短期和长期接触细颗粒物 (PM2.5) 空气污染会增加因主要心脏和肺部疾病入院的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Fine-pativity-matter-exposure-linked-to-increased-hospital-admissions-for-major-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Fine-pativity-matter-exposure-linked-to-increased-hospital-admissions-for-major-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=539daf85-9f0f-4d92-9407-5ef53b76d1b6 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:03:00 -0500 Fine particulate matter exposure linked to increased hospital admissions for major diseases
研究表明，及时的工程设计可以提高人工智能对医疗指南的遵守程度研究证明了提示工程在增强大语言模型对临床指南的遵守方面的有效性，其中 gpt-4-Web 和 ROT 提示显示出与骨关节炎指南的最高一致性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Prompt-engineering-boosts-AIs-adherence-to-medical-guidelines-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Prompt-engineering-boosts-AIs-adherence-to-medical-guidelines-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ade295f8-12c3-4982-9887-209895777364 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:01:00 -0500 Prompt engineering boosts AI's adherence to medical guidelines, study shows
全国调查显示美国人吸毒过量死亡的比例很高兰德公司的一项新研究显示，超过 40% 的美国人认识因吸毒过量而死亡的人，其中约三分之一的人表示，死亡事件扰乱了他们的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/National-survey-reveals-high-exposure-to-drug-overdose-deaths-among-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/National-survey-reveals-high-exposure-to-drug-overdose-deaths-among-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5354087-98b5-4e09-87c7-d84ef659eaf7 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 21:57:02 -0500
陈·扎克伯格倡议资助圣母大学关于衰老和神经退行性疾病的研究圣母大学获得了陈·扎克伯格倡议颁发的合作对试点项目奖，该项目旨在研究影响阿尔茨海默病等神经退行性疾病的基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Chan-Zuckerberg-Initiative-funds-Notre-Dame-research-on-aging-and-neurodegenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Chan-Zuckerberg-Initiative-funds-Notre-Dame-research-on-aging-and-neurodegenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e09d67c2-58d4-428c-877b-eea63aefe2d8 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 21:48:24 -0500 Chan Zuckerberg Initiative funds Notre Dame research on aging and neurodegeneration
合作项目获得 2000 万美元开发新的放射性药物癌症疗法UT 健康科学中心研究人员 Gabor Tigyi 医学博士、哲学博士、Harriet Van Vleet 基金会基础肿瘤学研究教授、Junming Yue 博士、病理学系副教授、Sue Chin Lee 博士、生理学系和 David Schwartz医学博士、放射肿瘤学系主任，是科学领导小组的成员，田纳西大学橡树岭创新研究所与橡树岭国家实验室和田纳西大学诺克斯维尔分校合作，获得了 2000 万美元的资助，用于开发新的放射性药物治疗癌症的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Collaborative-project-gets-2420-million-to-develop-new-radiopharmaceutical-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Collaborative-project-gets-2420-million-to-develop-new-radiopharmaceutical-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=221e4d60-a8e8-4dc4-a469-c9c888733649 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 21:43:27 -0500 Collaborative project gets $20 million to develop new radiopharmaceutical cancer therapies
COVID-19 的神经系统影响与免疫反应有关，而不是直接病毒攻击研究发现，COVID-19 患者的神经认知症状是对全身感染的反应，而不是直接的大脑感染，这突显了大脑免疫反应和突触组织的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/COVID-19s-neurological-effects-linked-to-immune-response-not-direct-viral-attack.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/COVID-19s-neurological-effects-linked-to-immune-response-not-direct-viral-attack.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe6a49e8-0c60-45e3-8ea2-03ea81d5b648 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 21:42:00 -0500 COVID-19's neurological effects linked to immune response, not direct viral attack
